metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11756 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper refcounting of soft token session objects could cause a use-after-free and crash (likely limited to a denial of service). This vulnerability affects Firefox < 71.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '71.0+build5-0ubuntu1').
